thread.title: Man shot to death in confrontation with Beverly police - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Man shot to death in confrontation with Beverly police - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Man shot to death in confrontation with Beverly police - Massachusetts news
text:
BEVERLY, Mass. (AP) — A 49-year-old Hamilton man was shot to death by Beverly police after they say he used his vehicle to ram several others, including two police cruisers.
Police say they responded to a report of a suicidal man on Balch Street Saturday afternoon.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Essex District Attorney Jonathan Blodgett says the suspect, whose identity has not been released, had slammed his GMC Envoy twice into another sport utility vehicle.
Blodgett says when an officer ordered him to stop, he rammed two police cruisers.
An officer fired a shot through the driver’s side window, hitting the man in the shoulder. He died later at a local hospital.
Police say the man knew one of the passengers inside the vehicle he was ramming.
